caption.p: Expression of hsp-110 is required for recovery from acute heat stress in C. elegans and G. rostochiensis. During RNAi knockdown of hsp-110 recovery from a heat stress of 3–6 h duration was significantly reduced in C. elegans ( A) and G. rostochiensis ( B) compared with gfp controls. Mean ± SEM, unpaired two-tailed Mann–Whitney test, n ≥ 5, * P < 0.05, ** P < 0.01, *** P < 0.001.
